page.title: 14Tattingstone Churches
page.content: There are two churches in this area and both are to be found in the village of Tattingstone. ST. MARY'S (1277) This church shares a vicar with Bentley.His name is Canon Eric Armson. The church is opened every day by the caretaker and has a service most Sundays from 11.00-1200.The services include family worship,childrens session,Holy Communion,and Parish Communion. There is a choir with nine members.Miss Carter is in charge of the choir and Mr David Rolinson is the organist.The church has an active bellringing group.The church plays an important role in village life . THE METHODIST CHURCH This is situated on the outskirts of the village and services are taken by Rev. Hawkes from Capel St. Mary.
